| Charon:* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* can [see invisible creatures](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is male.
* is normally generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful").
* [likes gold](/wiki/Gold_lover "Gold lover").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* appears only in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless"). |                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | [monst.c#line2323](/wiki/Monst.c#line2323 "Monst.c")           |

**Charon** is [not implemented yet](/wiki/Deferred_feature "Deferred feature").

Charon is a very high level peaceful [human](/wiki/@ "@") who, if true to his name's [mythology](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charon "wikipedia:Charon"), would ferry the player across the also-yet-to-be-implemented river Acheron/Styx for a fee.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Charon\&action=edit)*

## Encyclopedia entry

When an ancient Greek died, his soul went to the nether world:  
the Hades. To reach the nether world, the souls had to cross  
the river Styx, the river that separated the living from the  
dead. The Styx could be crossed by ferry, whose shabby ferry-  
man, advanced in age, was called Charon. The deceased's next-  
of-kin would place a coin under his tongue, to pay the ferry-  
man.

[![Wikipedia](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "Wikipedia")

[Wikipedia](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page "wikipedia:Main Page") has an article about:

***[Charon (mythology)](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charon_\(mythology\) "wikipedia:Charon (mythology)")***

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.")
html:
Charon

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ charon
Difficulty ???
Attacks Weapon 1d8, Touch 1d8 paralysis
@ charon
Difficulty ???
Attacks

Weapon 1d8, Touch 1d8 paralysis

Base level 76
Base experience ???
Speed 18
Base AC -5
Base MR 120
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) Unique
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Medium
Resistances Fire, Cold, Poison, Stoning
Resistances conveyed None

Charon:

  • does not breathe.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • likes gold.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference monst.c#line2323

Charon is not implemented yet.

Charon is a very high level peaceful human who, if true to his name's mythology, would ferry the player across the also-yet-to-be-implemented river Acheron/Styx for a fee.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

Encyclopedia entry

When an ancient Greek died, his soul went to the nether world:
the Hades. To reach the nether world, the souls had to cross
the river Styx, the river that separated the living from the
dead. The Styx could be crossed by ferry, whose shabby ferry-
man, advanced in age, was called Charon. The deceased's next-
of-kin would place a coin under his tongue, to pay the ferry-
man.

Wikipedia has an article about:
Charon (mythology)
